name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior ML Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing and deploying machine learning solutions using **Python**, **AWS**, **Azure**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**. My expertise includes building robust ML pipelines and integrating **ML**, **NLP**, and **GenAI** capabilities, particularly in large language models (**LLM**), ensuring scalability and performance. I have hands-on experience utilizing **GitHub** for version control and collaboration, along with proficiency in **SQL** for data management and querying.

In my previous roles, I've successfully led the development of enterprise-grade applications in the healthcare and financial sectors, harnessing **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for full-stack development. I have a strong foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, complemented by my knowledge of **Elastic Stack** for monitoring and logging. My experience extends to CI/CD practices, aligning with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS, ensuring that my solutions are not only effective but also secure.
